body: "Taxi drivers write the city. They move through its streets, they collect its stories, they are confronted with its changes" - this is part of the introduction page of CubbyKabi's podcast blog "Meter Down" containing conversations with Mumbai taxi Drivers.
original_body: "Taxi drivers write the city. They move through its streets, they collect its stories, they are confronted with its changes" - this is part of the introduction page of CubbyKabi's podcast blog "Meter Down" containing conversations with Mumbai taxi Drivers.
title: India: Writing The City In Conversation With Mumbai Taxi Drivers
